name: Simplistics Web Design Inc.
tagline: Websites that work. It's that simple.
description:
With over 500 websites to their credit so far, the team at Simplistics creates websites of beautiful aesthetics and user-friendly functionality built on leading-edge, industry-standard technologies. All sites are customized to client needs, true to the client’s vision, search engine optimized, and include training on use, functionality, and adaptability.
 
Simplistics works with distributors, manufacturers and professional service firms. Let their results speak for themselves – view their portfolio here: https://simplistics.ca/work/
